column5:
I know this feeling all too well right now. It's a nightmare.  Sometimes in the morning for that split second I can feel my old peaceful self before the waves of anxiety come rolling over the top and drowning me for a few seconds at a time. 

I just wish I could go back in time and change some choices I made when I was in dark places. Some times there just isn't a clear thought to be found. I haven't even properly started the journey into untangling this mess and some days I don't feel like I have the energy to even take the next step.
